About

I'm a machine learning researcher who's dabbled in both academia and industry. Recently I've been working on problems in natural language processing, deep learning, and interactive ML.

I spent some time in the PhD program at the University of Washington, working with Carlos Guestrin and Ira Kemelmacher-Shlizerman on projects in machine learning and computer vision.

Previously I was an undergraduate at Williams College (class of 2013), where I majored in mathematics and computer science, and completed an honors thesis in machine learning.
